name: Asociatia Pro Consumatori
goal:
Potrivit statutului asociaţiei, principalele obiective ale asociaţiei sunt:

* apărarea, promovarea şi reprezentarea prin toate mijloacele legale a drepturilor şi intereselor consumatorilor în raporturile cu agenţii economici şi instituţiile statului
* educare,consilierea şi informarea consumatorilor prin acţiuni proprii, publicaţii, studii de piaţă şi orice alte mijloace de informare în masă;
* analizarea şi rezolvarea sesizărilor formulate de consumatori, prin intermediul forţelor proprii ale asociaţiei sau prin organele abilitate ale statului;
* dezvoltarea parteneriatului internaţional în domeniul protecţiei consumatorilor;
* colaborarea cu organizaţii profesionale şi cu instituţii abilitate guvernamentale şi neguvernamentale, cu atribuţii în domeniul protecţiei consumatorilor, în vederea respectării intereselor consumatorilor;
* îmbunătăţirea cadrului legislativ general de protecţie a consumatorilor, prin solicitări adresate autorităţilor, prin participarea la elaborarea standardelor sau a specificaţiilor ce definesc bunurile de consum şi serviciile;
* desfăşurarea de activităţi publicistice şi editoriale;
* formare profesională a adulţilor în domeniul protecţiei consumatorilor;
* conştientizarea prin acţiuni proprii a agenţilor economici asupra drepturilor şi intereselor consumatorilor.

În cei 19 ani de activitate, APC – România, prin activităţile desfăşurate, a adus o contribuţie semnificativă la apărarea şi promovarea drepturilor consumatorilor, la îmbunătăţirea nivelului de informare şi educare a consumatorilor, precum şi la consolidarea mişcării consumatoriste din România.

The Romanian Association for Consumers’ Protection is a nongovernmental organization, apolitical and nonprofit and has been founded in 1990. Its main objective is the protection, promotion and representation, by all legal ways, of consumers’ rights and interests in relationship with the economic operators and state institutions.
At national level the Romanian Association for Consumers’ Protection was recognized through HG no. 1106/2005 as a public utility organization.
APC Romania is a member of Consumers International, BEUC and TACD (Trans Atlantic Consumer Dialogue).
According to the association’s statute, the main objectives of the association are:
• protection, promotion and representation by all legal ways of consumers’ rights and interests in relationship with the economic operators and state institutions;
• educate, give advice and inform consumers by personal actions, publications, market research and any other ways of mass informing;
• analyzing and solving the complaints made by consumers, through the association own ways or through the state authorities;
• international partnership development in the consumer’s protection domain;
• collaboration with professional organizations and with governmental and nongovernmental institutions, that have tasks in consumer’s protection domain, in order to assure the respect of consumers’ rights;
• improving the general legislative framework for consumer’s protection, through requirements addressed to the authorities, by participation in the elaboration of standards or specifications that define the services and consumer goods;
• unfolding editorial and journalistic activities;
• adult professional formation in consumer’s protection domain;
• raise the economic operators' consciousness of their personal actions on consumers' rights and interests.

Our main activities are:
• Represent consumers and promote consumers interests.
• Lobby for improvement of level of consumers’ protection, enforcement of consumers’ rights as well as consumers’ information and education;
• Enhance transparency of production methods and quality of products and services offered on the market
• Inform consumers on the main characteristics of the products and services offered on the market
• Give advice to consumers referring to solving specific problem
